price: 44. Hadday arkaan gabal cirka ka mid ah oo soo dhacaya7 waxay odhan: Waa daruuro is dul saaran (cinaad darti).
arabic: وَإِن يَرَوۡاْ كِسۡفٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ سَاقِطٗا يَقُولُواْ سَحَابٞ مَّرۡكُومٞ
footnotes: 7. Kaasoo calaamo u ah soo degitaanka Ciqaabka Ilaahay, sida ay dalbadeen ah.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-in yaraw kis'fan mina al-samāi sāqiṭan yaqūlū saḥābun markūmun
